title: Victoria Greene breaks down her investment thesis on Netflix, Intel and SLB
text: Victoria Greene, G Squared Capital, joins 'The Exchange' to discuss Greene's investing take on Netflix, Intel and SLB.

title: SLB: Excessive Optimism Already Baked In Before Q4 Earnings
text: SLB N.V. (SLB) stands as the industry's leading, most innovative oilfield services provider, with a diversified, end-to-end portfolio. SLB's financials are robust: double-digit profitability metrics, healthy liquidity, low leverage, and a $3B+ cash position support dividend stability. Recent geopolitical shifts in Venezuela could significantly expand SLB's addressable market, but there are risks to consider as well.

title: Trade Tracker: Bill Baruch sells T-Mobile and buys more Cheniere, SLB and ExxonMobil

title: Why Venezuela Matters For SLB Stock?
text: SLB's stock (NYSE: SLB), the largest oilfield services firm in the world, has returned to the attention of investors—not due to soaring oil prices, but rather because geopolitics are altering global upstream expectations. Even with relatively stable crude prices, the stock has risen approximately 16% over the past year, indicating that investors are paying more attention to global activity levels, margin sustainability, and geopolitical flexibility.
